page.title: 01LANDSCAPE GENERAL TILSTON
page.content: This is a{quiet rural area.}To the south-east of the block is the village of Tilston which is a{typical rural {village}with a fairly{close knit {community.}It has a small{village {green}complete with a horse chestnut tree and{village stocks.}It consists of a post office, grocers shop, village cobblers, two pubs, an antique shop, two small housing estates, many older houses, a Methodist chapel and a Norman church. There is also a village hall which is used for a variety of activities. A recreation field is used for sporting activities and the annual "Wakes". The block has many farms mostly{dairy.}It also contains the two hamlets of{Stretton and Carden.}The land is quite{hilly}and there are many {streams.}There are many trees along the hedges and a couple of woods. The pasture land is ideal for Cattle.
